'''Adorned Unagi''' is a type of [[Unagi]] that can be found in the wild in [[Inazuma]]. It normally has its upper body sticking out of the water, but will quickly hide if startled.

==Drops==
{{Card|Eel Meat|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Adorned Unagi can be found near water in Inazuma, particularly on [[Watatsumi Island]].

See the '''[https://act.hoyolab.com/ys/app/interactive-map/index.html?lang=en-us#/map/2?shown_types=308 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
